title: Enhancing HR Management Practical Competencies: Self-Directed Learning Strategy Design in Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can secure more than 10 hours per week of self-directed learning time through Team-Based Learning (TBL).
Learners can establish and implement role-specific learning plans for real-world job scenarios using Problem-Based Learning (PBL).
Learners allocate at least 30 hours per week to learning, with 50% dedicated to self-directed study aligned with scheduled activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
